ComicInfo.Penciller: Erik Larsen,Karl Hörnell,Nick Derington,Chris Eliopoulos,Erik Larsen,Nick Derington,Karl Hörnell
ComicInfo.Summary: Traveling with Neutron Bob, Dragon finds his way to Chicago to enlist the help of the Vicious Circle in defeating Cyberface. When he arrives, he is attacked and forced underground, losing Bob along the way. Underground, he finds Rock, Feezle, Beast Boy and Widow, but in this reality, they have never met. Dragon tries to enlist their help, but they decide to not help Dragon. He wanders off in search of Pipe Town and the Vicious Circle and is attacked along the way by Dale Fisher, who has been mutated by someone known as "The Creator."
ComicInfo.Tags: Savage Dragon,Neutron Bob,Frank Darling,The Demolisher,Rock,Feezle,Beast Boy,Widow
ComicInfo.Title: Homecoming; Lowblow In Snackers Anonymous; Savage Dragonbert and Hitler's Brainbert
